<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to use a new LLVM integer type if there is a mismatch between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of bits in LLVM and SPIRV integer types to let DuplicateTracker</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ensure uniqueness of a SPIRV type by the corresponding LLVM type. Without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// such an adjustment SPIRVGlobalRegistry::getOpTypeInt() could create the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same &quot;OpTypeInt 8&quot; type for a series of LLVM integer types with number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits less than 8 This would lead to duplicate type definitions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// eventually due to the method that DuplicateTracker utilizes to reason</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// about uniqueness of type records.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;SPIRVGlobalRegistry::adjustIntTypeByWidth(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IType = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;IntegerType&gt;</a>(Ty)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcBitWidth = IType-&gt;getBitWidth();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcBitWidth &gt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> = adjustOpTypeIntWidth(SrcBitWidth);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Maybe change source LLVM type to keep DuplicateTracker consistent.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcBitWidth != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>)</span></CodeLine>
